titles.title: Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park Addition Act of 2002
To revise the boundary of the Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in the State of Hawaii.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 10/8/2002--Introduced. Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park Addition Act of 2002 - Modifies the boundaries of Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in Hawaii to include specified lands.
